Just finished the final assembly of draft genomes for six species of
seed ants from the genus *Aphaenogaster*. You can read the pre-print
of the paper
[here](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/early/2018/04/24/302679). 

The sequences will be released on NCBI in May 2018
[check them out here](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/PRJNA385595).
